flawed_nl_solution:
The factory due to shortages will produce 200 - 50 = <<200-50=170>>170 cars.
Due to the pandemic, they will now produce 170 / 2 = <<170/2=85>>85 cars.
The company will have to manufacture 85 * 5 = <<85*5=425>>425 doors.
#### 425

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150, not 170. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
